snippet.title: Operation Gekkou Footage Trailer (version 1.3)
snippet.description:
Link (Note: Download Version is recommended, just scroll down on the page for the button)
https://mister-spaceman.itch.io/guns-girlz-operation-gekkou

Hoyostans:
https://hoyostans.be/explore/honkai-2nd/

Operation Gekkou is the effort to turn the story of GGZ into a Visual Novel with refurbished English translations. It is intended to make the story more accessible to the English speaking audience, as well as improve upon the text and translations. Additionally, it is meant to encourage players to support the game by players through the game's stages on the Japanese servers. 
This is a part of Project: Rebirth, the initiative to make GGZ as a game and as a story more accessible.

If miHoYo allows it, we will continue this project by adapting the rest of GGZ, covering more and more of the story as we go along.

This project contains assets and music owned by miHoYo. If miHoYo wants it taken down, we will take it down.
